page.title: 05WOKINGHAM - LIFE STYLES
page.content: Wokingham has grown from a small market town into a commuter town for London, Reading and Bracknell. A variety of light industries centred on electronics has also developed here. Life styles of the majority are typified by London commuters, computer/high technology workers and the service industries. Most of the people would be considered middle class and community activities are reasonably well supported. Unemployment is low,and in general the town reflects the affluent life style of most of the population with expensive speciality shops, a range of supermarkets, but suprisingly few restaurants. Housing costs are high and most housing is privately owned.
